name: ICEBOX: Speedgunner
description: A competitive Run-and-Gun 3D Platforming FPS video game ...THE CLOCK'S TICKING… Carve an ice-cool path through the Icebox, cutting corners, dodging obstacles & eliminating guards, as you race to become the Ultimate Speedgunner. Can you “Escape the Icebox” before time runs out?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: VRAM 512MB DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 400 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated chipset
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10+ Processor: i5-6500 3.2GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: VRAM 2GB DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space Additional Notes: SSD, 1080p 60Hz+ Monitor, Mouse/Keyboard highly recommended
